original: Pucchā – pubbe appavāritassa āvuso aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahatāniṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: pucchā pubbe a pavāritassa āvuso aññātakam gahapatim vā gahatānim vā upasaṅkamitvā

original: cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa ca aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ
analyzed: cīvare vikappam āpajjantassa ca aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappam

original: āpajjantassa ca nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ.
analyzed: āpajjantassa ca nissaggiyam pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante paññattam

original: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā kam āvuso ārabbha kismin vatthusmin paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā āyasmantam bhante upanandam sakyaputtam ārabbha paññattam āyasmai bhante

original: upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ
analyzed: upanandaḥ sakya putto pubbe a pavāritaḥ aññātakam gahapatikam upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappam

original: āpajji. Soyeva bhante āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātake gahapatike
analyzed: āpajji saḥ yā iva bhante āyasmā upanandaḥ sakya putto pubbe a pavārito aññātake gahapatike

original: upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappam āpajji tasmin bhante vatthusmin paññattam

original: 1. Cīvaravagga 10. rāja sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: cīvaravagga rāja sikkhāpucchā

analyzed: kosiyavagga dvebhāga sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā kam āvuso ārabbha kismin vatthusmin paññattam

analyzed: vissajjanā chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū aññātikāhi bhikkhūnīhi eḷaka lomāni dhovāpesuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṃ bhante upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā āyasmantam bhante upanandam sakya puttam ārabbha paññattam āyasmā bhante upanandaḥ sakya putto rūpiyam paṭiggahesi tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
analyzed: pucchā katham āvuso tattha paṭipajjantaḥ rūpiyam paṭiggaṇhāti nāma

original: Vissajjanā – sayaṃ bhante gaṇhāti, aññaṃ vā gaṇhāpesi, idaṃ ayyassa hotūti upanikkhittaṃ sādiyati, evaṃ kho bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
analyzed: vissajjanā sayam bhante gaṇhāti aññam vā gaṇhāpesi idam ayyassa hotu uti upanikkhittam sādiyati evam kho bhante paṭipajjantaḥ bhikkhu rūpiyam paṭiggaṇhāti nāma

original: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ na paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
analyzed: pucchā katham āvuso tattha paṭipajjantaḥ bhikkhu rūpiyam na paṭiggaṇhāti nāma

original: Vissajjanā – yathā bhante rājasikkhāpade yathā ca bhante meṇḍakasikkhāpade āgacchati, tathā bhante paṭipajjanto bhikkhu rūpiyaṃ na paṭiggaṇhātināma.
analyzed: vissajjanā yathā bhante rāja sikkhāpade yathā ca bhante meṇḍaka sikkhāpade āgacchati tathā bhante paṭipajjantaḥ bhikkhu rūpiyam na paṭiggaṇhāti nāma

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante paññattam

original: Pucchā – kaṃ āvuso ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā kam āvuso ārabbha kismin vatthusmin paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū nānappakārakam rūpiya saṃvohāram samāpajjiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – bhikkhuṃ āvuso kupitena anattamanena saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā bhikkhum āvuso kupitena anattamanena saṅghikāḥ vihārāḥ nikkaḍḍhentassa pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyā

original: bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhū saṅghikāvihārā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
analyzed: bhante bhikkhū kupitāḥ an atta manāḥ bhikkhū saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu tasmin bhante

original: vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vatthusmim paññattam

original: 2. Bhūtagāmavagga, 8. vehāsakuṭi sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: bhūtagāma vagga vehāsakuṭi sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – uparivehāsakuṭiyā āvuso āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃvā pīṭhaṃvā abhinisīdantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā upari vehāsa kuṭiyā āvuso āhacca pādakam mañcam vā pīṭham vā abhinisīdantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha paññattam aññataraḥ bhante

original: bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsa kuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ sahasā abhinisīdi,
analyzed: bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsa kuṭiyā āhacca pādakam mañcam sahasā abhinisīdi

original: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 2. Bhūtagāmavagga, 9. mahallakavihāra sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: bhūtagāma vagga mahallakavihāra sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – dvatti pariyāye āvuso adhiṭṭhahitvā tatuttari adhiṭṭhahantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā dvatti pariyāye āvuso adhiṭṭhahitvā tatuttari adhiṭṭhahantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā
analyzed: vissajjanā kosambiyam bhante āyasmantam channattheram ārabbha paññattam āyasmā

original: bhante chando katapariyositaṃ vihāraṃ punappunaṃ chādāpesi punappunaṃ lepāpesi, atibhārito
analyzed: bhante chando kata pariyositam vihāram punappunam chādāpesi punappunam lepāpesi ati bhārito

original: vihāro paripati, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vihāraḥ paripati tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 2. Bhūtagāmavagga, 10. sappāṇaka sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: bhūtagāma vagga sappāṇaka sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃvā mattikaṃvā siñcantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā āvuso sappāṇakam udakam tiṇam vā mattikam vā siñcantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇampi mattikampi siñciṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā āḷaviyam bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam āḷavikāḥ bhante bhikkhū jānam sappāṇakam udakam tiṇam pi mattikam pi siñciṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 3. Ovādavagga, 1. ovāda sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: ovāda vagga ovāda sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – asammatena āvuso bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā asammatena āvuso bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asammatā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū asammatāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 3. Ovādavagga, 2. atthaṅgata sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: ovāda vagga atthaṅgata sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – atthaṅgate āvuso sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā atthaṅgate āvuso sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante cūḷapanthako atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante āyasmantam cūḷapanthakam ārabbha paññattam āyasmā bhante cūḷapanthakaḥ atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadi tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 3. Ovādavagga, 3-4. bhikkhunupassaya, āmisa sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: ovāda vagga bhikkhu upassaya āmisa sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – bhikkhunupassayaṃ āvuso upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassaca āmisahetu
analyzed: pucchā bhikkhuni passayam āvuso upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadantassa ca āmisa hetu

original: therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇantassaca pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
analyzed: therāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadanti iti bhaṇantassa ca pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam

original: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā bhikkhun upassayam upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadantassa pācittiyam bhante

original: sakkesu chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ
analyzed: sakkesu chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū bhikkhun upassayam

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṃsu, āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadiṃsu āmisa hetu therāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadanti iti

original: bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
analyzed: bhaṇantassa pācittiyam sāvatthiyam chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyā

original: bhante bhikkhū āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
analyzed: bhante bhikkhū āmisa hetu therāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadanti iti bhaṇiṃsu tasmin bhante

original: vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vatthusmim paññattam

original: 3. Ovādavagga, 5. cīvaradāna sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: ovāda vagga cīvara dāna sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaram dentassa pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ adāsi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha paññattam aññataraḥ bhante bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaram adāsi tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 3. Ovādavagga, 6. cīvarasibbana sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: ovāda vagga cīvara sibbana sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaram sibbentassa pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante āyasmantam udāyim ārabbha paññattam āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaram sibbesi tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 3. Ovādavagga, 7. saṃvidhāna sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: ovāda vagga saṃvidhāna sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – bhikkhunayā āvuso saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā bhikkhunayā āvuso saddhim saṃvidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjantassa pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyā

original: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu, tasmiṃ
analyzed: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhim saṃvidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjiṃsu tasmin

original: bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 3. Ovādavagga, 8. nāvābhiruhana sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: ovāda vagga nāvā abhiruhana sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā āvuso saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā bhikkhuniyā āvuso saddhim saṃvidhāya ekam nāvam abhiruhantassa pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyā

original: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
analyzed: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnīhi saddhim saṃvidhāya ekam nāvam abhiruhiṃsu tasmim bhante

original: vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vatthusmim paññattam

original: 3. Ovādavagga, 9. paripācita sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: ovāda vagga paripācita sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā jānan āvuso bhikkhuni paripācitam piṇḍapātam bhuñjantassa pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, devadatto bhante jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante devadattam ārabbha paññattam devadattaḥ bhante jānam bhikkhuni paripācitam piṇḍapātam bhuñji tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 3. Ovādavagga, 10. rahonisajja sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: ovāda vagga rahonisajja sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ āvuso eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā bhikkhuniyā saddhim āvuso ekaḥ ekāya rahaḥ nisajjam kappentassa pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante udāyī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante āyasmantam udāyim ārabbha paññattam āyasmā bhante udāyī bhikkhuniyā saddhim ekaḥ ekāya rahaḥ nisajjam kappesi tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 4. Bhojanavagga, 1. āvasathapiṇḍa sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: bhojana vagga āvasatha piṇḍa sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – tatuttari āvuso āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā tatuttari āvuso āvasatha piṇḍam bhuñjantassa pācittiyam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyā

original: bhante bhikkhū anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
analyzed: bhante bhikkhū anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasatha piṇḍam paribhuñjiṃsu tasmin bhante

original: vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vatthusmim paññattam

original: 4. Bhojanavagga, 2. gaṇabhojana sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: bhojana vagga gaṇa bhojana sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – gaṇabhojane pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā gaṇa bhojane pācittiyam āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante devadattaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, devadatto bhante sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante devadattam ārabbha paññattam devadattaḥ bhante sa parisaḥ kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñji tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 4. Bhojanavagga 3. paramparabhojana sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: bhojana vagga parampara bhojana sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – parampara bhojane pācittiyaṃ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā parampara bhojane pācittiyam āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā vesāliyam bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante bhikkhū aññatra nimantitāḥ aññatra bhuñjiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 4. Bhojanavagga, 4. kāṇamātu sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: bhojana vagga kāṇamātu sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – dvattipattapūraṃ pūvaṃ paṭiggahetvā tatuttari paṭiggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā dvatti patta pūram pūvam paṭiggahetvā tat uttari paṭiggaṇhantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā pūvaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante bhikkhū na mattam jānitvā pūvam paṭiggahesuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – kassa āvuso vacanaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā kassa āvuso vacanam

original: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: vissajjanā bhagavataḥ bhante vacanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Pucchā – kenāvuso ābhataṃ.
analyzed: pucchā kena āvuso ābhatam

original: Vissajjanā – paramparāya bhante ābhataṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā paramparāya bhante ābhatam

original: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
analyzed: pucchā atthi nu kho āvuso ettha koci pi viraddha doso

original: Vissajjanā – natthi bhante.
analyzed: vissajjanā na atthi bhante

original: 4. Bhojanavagga, 5. paṭhamapavāraṇā sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: bhojana vagga paṭhama pavāraṇā sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – yaṃ tena sāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena bhuttāvinā parivātena anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃvā
analyzed: pucchā yam tena sāvuso upe sammāsambuddhena bhuttāvinā parivātena an atirittam khādanīyam vā

original: bhojanīyaṃvā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: bhojanīyam vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhuttāvī pavāritā aññatra bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.

original: Pucchā – orenaddhamāsaṃ āvuso nahāyantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā orenaddha māsam āvuso nahāyantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rājānampi passitvā na mattaṃ jānitvā nahāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante bhikkhū rājānam pi passitvā na mattam jānitvā nahāyiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – kassa āvuso vacanaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā kassa āvuso vacanam

original: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: vissajjanā bhagavataḥ bhante vacanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Pucchā – kenāvuso ābhataṃ.
analyzed: pucchā kena āvuso ābhatam

original: Vissajjanā – paramparāya bhante ābhataṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā paramparāya bhante ābhatam

original: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viruddhadoso.
analyzed: pucchā atthi nu kho āvuso ettha koci pi viruddha doso

original: Vissajjanā – natthi bhante.
analyzed: vissajjanā na atthi bhante

original: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho…pe… saṃgāyeyyāma.
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghope saṃgāyeyyāma

original: Pucchā – yaṃ tena āvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena anādiyitvā tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ
analyzed: pucchā yam tena āvuso upe sammāsambuddhena an ādiyitvā tiṇṇam dubbaṇṇa karaṇānam

original: aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ,
analyzed: aññataram dubbaṇṇa karaṇam navam cīvaram paribhuñjantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam

original: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū attano cīvaraṃ na sañjāniṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante bhikkhū attanaḥ cīvaram na sañjāniṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 6. Surāpānavagga, 10. cīvaraapanidhāna sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: surā pāna vagga cīvara apanidhāna sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidhentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā bhikkhussa āvuso pattam vā cīvaram vā nisīdanam vā sūci gharam vā kāya bandhanam vā apanidhentassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnam pattam pi cīvaram pi apanidhesum tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 7. Sappāṇakavagga, 1. sañcicca sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sappāṇaka vagga sañcicca sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – sañcicca āvuso pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā sañcicca āvuso pāṇam jīvitā voropentassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ āyasmā bhante udāyī sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante āyasmantam udāyim ārabbha paññattam āyasmā bhante udāyī sañcit ca pāṇam jīvitā voropesi tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 7. Sappāṇakavagga, 2. sappāṇaka sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sappāṇaka vagga sappāṇaka sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā āvuso sappāṇakam udakam paribhuñjantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū jānam sappāṇakam udakam paribhuñjiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 7. Sappāṇakavagga, 6. theyyasattha sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sappāṇaka vagga theyyasattha sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā āvuso theyyasatthena saddhim saṃvidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha paññattam aññataraḥ bhante

original: bhikkhu jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajji, tasmiṃ
analyzed: bhikkhu jānam theyyasatthena saddhim saṃvidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajji tasmin

original: bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 7. Sappāṇakavagga, 7. saṃvidhāna sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sappāṇakavagga saṃvidhāna sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – mātugāmena saddhiṃ āvuso saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā mātugāmena saddhim āvuso saṃvidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha paññattam aññataraḥ bhante

original: bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhim saṃvidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajji tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 8. Sahadhammikavagga, 1. sahadhammika sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sahadhammika vagga sahadhammika sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – bhikkhūhi āvuso sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānena na tāvāhaṃ āvuso etasmiṃ sikkhāpade
analyzed: pucchā bhikkhūhi āvuso sahadhammikam vuccamānena na tāva aham āvuso etasmim sikkhāpade

original: sikkhissāmi, yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇantassa
analyzed: sikkhissāmi yāva na aññam bhikkhum byattam vinaya dharam paripucchissāmi iti bhaṇantassa

original: pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā kosambiyam bhante āyasmantam channam ārabbha paññattam āyasmā bhante

original: channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno na tāvāhaṃ āvuso etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi,
analyzed: channaḥ bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ na tāva aham āvuso etasmim sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi

original: yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇi, tasmiṃ bhante
analyzed: yāva na aññam bhikkhum byattam vinaya dharam paripucchissāmi iti tasmim bhante

original: vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vatthusmim paññattam

original: 8. Sahadhammikavagga, 2. vilekhana sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sahadhammika vagga vilekhana sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – vinayaṃ vivaṇṇentassa āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā vinayam vivaṇṇentassa āvuso pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vinayaṃ vivaṇṇesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū vinayam vivaṇṇesuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 8. Sahadhammikavagga, 3. mohana sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sahadhammika vagga mohana sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – mohanake āvuso pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā mohanake āvuso pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mohesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū mohesuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso kupitena anattamanena pahāraṃ dentassa ca talasattikaṃ uggirantassa ca pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā bhikkhussa āvuso kupitena anattamanena pahāram dentassa ca talasattikam uggirantassa ca pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyā

original: bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pahāraṃ adaṃsu, talasattikañca
analyzed: bhante bhikkhū kupitāḥ anattamanāḥ sattarasavaggiyānam bhikkhūnam pahāram adaṃsu talasattikam ca

original: uggiriṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: uggiriṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 8. Sahadhammikavagga, 7. sañcicca sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sahadhammika vagga sañcicca sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – bhikkhussa āvuso sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā bhikkhussa āvuso sañcicca kukkuccam upadahantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnam sañcicca kukkuccam upadahiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 8. Sahadhammikavagga, 8. upassuti sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sahadhammika vagga upassuti sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – bhikkhūnaṃ āvuso bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādā pannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā bhikkhūnam āvuso bhaṇḍana jātānam kalaha jātānam vivāda āpannānam upassutim tiṭṭhantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyā

original: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalaha jātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ
analyzed: bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnam bhaṇḍana jātānam kalaha jātānam vivāda āpannānam upassutim

original: tiṭṭhahiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: tiṭṭhahiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 8. Sahadhammikavagga, 9. kammapaṭibāhana sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sahadhammika vagga kammapaṭibāhana sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – dhammikānaṃ āvuso kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā dhammikānam āvuso kammānam chandam datvā pacchā khīyana dhammaṃ āpajjantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyā

original: bhante bhikkhū dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjiṃsu,
analyzed: bhante bhikkhū dhammikānam kammānam chandam datvā pacchā khīyana dhammaṃ āpajjiṃsu

original: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 8. Sahadhammikavagga 10. chandaṃ adatvāgamana sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sahadhammika vagga chandam a datvā āgamana sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – saṅghe āvuso vinicchakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā saṅghe āvuso vinicchakathāya vattamānāya chandam a datvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkamantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha paññattam aññataraḥ bhante

original: chabbaggiyo bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
analyzed: chabbaggiyaḥ bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchaya kathāya vattamānāya chandam a datvā uṭṭhāya āsanā

original: pakkāmi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 8. Sahadhammikavagga, 12. pariṇāmana sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: sahadhammika vagga pariṇāmana sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – jānaṃ āvuso saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā āvuso saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam puggalassa pariṇāmentassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyā

original: bhante bhikkhū jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante
analyzed: bhante bhikkhū jānam saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam puggalassa pariṇāmesuṃ tasmim bhante

original: vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vatthusmim paññattam

original: 9. Ratanavagga, 1. antepura sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: ratanavagga antepura sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – pubbe appaṭisaṃviditena āvuso rañño antepuraṃ pavisantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā pubbe a paṭisaṃviditena āvuso raññaḥ antepuram pavisantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante ānando pubbe appaṭisaṃvidito rañño antepuraṃ pāvisi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante āyasmantam ānandam ārabbha paññattam āyasmā bhante ānandaḥ pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaḥ raññaḥ antepuram pāvisi tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 9. Ratanavagga, 2. ratana sikkhāpucchā
analyzed: ratana vagga ratana sikkhāpucchā

original: Pucchā – ratanaṃ āvuso uggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā ratanam āvuso uggaṇhantassa pācittiyam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu ratanaṃ uggahesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha paññattam aññataraḥ bhante bhikkhu ratanam uggahesi tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: 9. Ratanavagga, 3. vikālagāmappavisana sikkhāpucchā

analyzed: ca patta nillehakam bhuñjantassa ca oṭṭha nillehakam bhuñjantassa dukkaṭam sāvatthiyam

original: paññattaṃ, chabbaggiye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū

original: hatthanillehakaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, pattanillehakaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, oṭṭhanillehakaṃ bhuñjiṃsu,
analyzed: hattha nillehakam bhuñjiṃsu patta nillehakam bhuñjiṃsu oṭṭha nillehakam bhuñjiṃsu

original: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

analyzed: sa āmisena hatthena pānīya thālakam paṭiggaṇhantassa ca sa sitthakam patta dhovanam antaraghare

analyzed: chaḍḍentassa ca dukkaṭam bhaggesu paññattam sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam

original: sambahulā bhikkhū sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahesuṃ, teyeva bhante sambahulā
analyzed: sambahulāḥ bhikkhū sa āmisena hatthena pānīya thālakam paṭiggahesum teyeva bhante sambahulā

original: bhikkhū sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhū sa sitthakam patta dhovanam antara ghare chaḍḍesum tasmin bhante vatthusmin paññattam

analyzed: pucchā anādariyam āvuso paṭicca chatta pāṇissa dhammam desentassa ca daṇḍa pāṇissa

original: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyā

analyzed: pucchā anādariyam āvuso paṭicca ṭhitena uccāram vā passāvam vā karontassa ca harite

analyzed: pucchā bhikkhunīnam āvuso pañcama pārājikam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – ussayavādikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṃ karontiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante tullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto, thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihari, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante tullanandam bhikkhunim ārabbha paññattaḥ thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī ussaya vādikā vihari tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattaḥ

original: Pucchā – coriṃ āvuso vuṭṭhāpentiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
analyzed: pucchā corim āvuso vuṭṭhāpentiyā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññatto

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto, thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī coriṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante thullanandam bhikkhunim ārabbha paññattaḥ thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī corim vuṭṭhāpesi tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattaḥ

original: Pucchā – ekāya āvuso gāmantaraṃ gacchantiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
analyzed: pucchā ekāya āvuso gāmantaram gacchantiyā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññatto

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha paññatto, aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññatto.
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante aññataram bhikkhunim ārabbha paññattaḥ aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaram gacchi tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattaḥ

original: Alaṃ āvuso mā agamittha.
analyzed: alam āvusaḥ mā agamittha

original: Ete bhikkhave dve sahāyakā āgacchanti kolito upatisso ca etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayugaṃ.
analyzed: ete bhikkhave dve sahāyakā āgacchanti kolitaḥ upatissaḥ ca etam me sāvaka yugam bhavissati aggam bhadda yugam

original: Labheyyāma mayaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyāma upasampadaṃ.
analyzed: labheyyāma mayam bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjam labheyyāma upasampadam

original: Etha bhikkhavo svākhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
analyzed: etha bhikkhavaḥ su ākhātaḥ dhammaḥ caratha brahmacariyam sammā dukkhassa anta kiriyāya

original: Pucchā – upajjhāyo āvuso gaṇhituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
analyzed: pucchā upajjhāyaḥ āvuso gaṇhitum bhagavatā kattha anuññātaḥ kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim anuññātaḥ

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto, sambahulā bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaḥ sambahulā bhante

original: bhikkhū anupajjhāyakā anācariyakā anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā
analyzed: bhikkhū an upajjhāyakāḥ an ācariyakāḥ an ovadiyamānāḥ an anusāsiyamānāḥ dunnivatthāḥ duppārutā

original: anokappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
analyzed: anokappa sampannā piṇḍāya cariṃsu tasmin bhante vatthusmin anuññātaḥ

original: Pucchā – upajjhāyamhi āvuso na sammāvattantassa dukkaṭaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā upajjhāyamhi āvuso na sammāvattantassa dukkaṭam kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule saddhivihārike ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante saddhivihārikā upajjhāyamhi na sammāvattiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante sambahule saddhivihārike ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante saddhivihārikāḥ upajjhāyamhi na sammāvattiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ñāticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
analyzed: pucchā kadā āvuso bhagavatā tīhi saraṇa gamanehi upasampadam paṭikkhipitvā ñāti catutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā

original: Vissajjanā – rādhabrāhmaṇassa bhante pabbajitakāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ñātticatutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā.
analyzed: vissajjanā rādha brāhmaṇassa bhante pabbajita kāle bhagavatā tīhi saraṇa gamanehi upasampadam paṭikkhipitvā ñātti catutthena kammena upasampadā anuññātā

original: Konu kho bhikkhave tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṃ sarati.
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho bhikkhave tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāram sarati

original: Ahaṃ kho bhante tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṃ sarāmi.
analyzed: aham kho bhante tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāram sarāmi

original: Sādhu sādhu sāriputta, kataññuno hi sāriputta sappurisā katavedino.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu sāriputta kataññunaḥ hi sāriputta sappurisāḥ kata vedinaḥ

original: Kathāhaṃ bhante taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ upasampādemi.
analyzed: kathā aham bhante tam brāhmaṇam upasampādemi

original: Yāsā bhikkhave mayā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadāanuññātā, taṃ ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi.
analyzed: yāsā bhikkhave mayā tīhi saraṇa gamanehi upasampadā anuññātā tam ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi

original: Anujānāmi bhikkhave ñātticatutthena kammena upasampādetuṃ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave ñātti catutthena kammena upasampādetum

original: Pucchā – ayācitakaṃ āvuso upasampadāpekkhaṃ upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā a yācitakam āvuso upasampadā apekkham upasampādentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu upasampannasamanantaraṃ anācāraṃ acari, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha paññattam aññataraḥ bhante bhikkhu upasampanna samanantaram anācāram acari tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – catunnaṃ āvuso nissayānaṃ ācikkhaṇā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
analyzed: pucchā catunnam āvuso nissayānam ācikkhaṇā bhagavatā kattha anuññātā kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim anuññātā

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātā, aññataro bhante bhikkhu udarassa kāraṇā pabbaji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha anuññātā aññataraḥ bhante bhikkhu udarassa kāraṇā pabbaji tasmim bhante vatthusmim anuññātā

original: Ehi dāni āvuso piṇḍāya carissāma.
analyzed: ehi dāni āvuso piṇḍāya carissāma

original: Kathañhi nāma bhikkhu evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye udarassa kāraṇā pabbajissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhu evam su ākkhāte dhamma vinaye udarassa kāraṇā pabbajissati

original: Pucchā – ūnadasavassena āvuso upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā ūna dasa vassena āvuso upasampādentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ upasenaṃ vaṅgantaputtaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ,
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante āyasmantam upasenam vaṅganta puttam ārabbha paññattam

original: āyasmā bhante upaseno vaṅgantaputto ekavasso saddhivihārikaṃ upasampādesi, tasmiṃ
analyzed: āyasmā bhante upasenaḥ vaṅganta putto eka vassaḥ saddhivihārikam upasampādesi tasmin

original: bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – bālena āvuso abyattena upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā bālena āvuso abyattena upasampādentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante

original: bhikkhū “dasavassamhā dasavassamhā”ti bālā abyattā upasampādesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhū dasa vassamhā dasa vassamhā ati bālāḥ abyattāḥ upasampādesum tasmin bhante vatthusmin paññattam

original: Pucchā – ācariyo āvuso gaṇhituṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññāto, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
analyzed: pucchā ācariyaḥ āvuso gaṇhitum bhagavatā kattha anuññātaḥ kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim anuññātaḥ

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññāto, sambahulā bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātaḥ sambahulā bhante

original: bhikkhū upajjhāyesu pakkantesupi vibbhantesupi kālaṅkatesupi pakkhasaṅkantesupi anācariyakā
analyzed: bhikkhū upajjhāyesu pakkantesu pi vibbhantesu pi kālaṅkatesu pi pakkha saṅkantesu pi an ācariyakā

original: anovadiyamānā ananusāsiyamānā dunnivatthā duppārutā anākappasampannā piṇḍāya cariṃsu,
analyzed: an ovadiyamānāḥ an anusāsiyamānāḥ dunnivatthāḥ duppārutāḥ an ākappa sampannāḥ piṇḍāya cariṃsu

original: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññāto.
analyzed: tasmin bhante vatthusmin anuññātaḥ

original: Pucchā – pañcahi āvuso ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā pañcahi āvuso ābādhehi phuṭṭham pabbājentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ pabbājesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante bhikkhū pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭham pabbājesuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Sādhu bhante ayyā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ na pabbājeyyuṃ…
analyzed: sādhu bhante ayyā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭham na pabbājeyyum

original: Pucchā – rājabhaṭaṃ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā rāja bhaṭam āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rājabhaṭe pabbājesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante bhikkhū rāja bhaṭe pabbājesuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – dhajabandhaṃ āvuso coraṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā dhajabandham āvuso coram pabbājentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante aṅgulimālaṃ coraṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aṅgulimālo bhante coro bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagaheya iva bhante aṅgulimālam coram ārabbha paññattam aṅgulimālaḥ bhante coraḥ bhikkhūsu pabbajitaḥ hoti tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – kārabhedakaṃ āvuso coraṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā kārabhedakam āvuso coram pabbājentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū kārabhedakacoraṃ pabbājesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagaheya iva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante bhikkhū kāra bhedaka coram pabbājesuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – iṇāyikaṃ āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā iṇāyikam āvuso pabbājentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū iṇāyikaṃ pabbājesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagaheya iva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante bhikkhū iṇāyikam pabbājesuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – dāsaṃ āvuso pabbajentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā dāsam āvuso pabbajentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū dāsaṃ pabbājesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagaheya iva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante bhikkhū dāsam pabbājesuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – bhaṇḍukammāya āvuso apalokanaṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā bhaṇḍukammāya āvuso apalokanam bhagavatā kattha anuññātam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim anuññātam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagaheyeva bhante aññataraṃ kammārabhaṇḍuputtaṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagaheya iva bhante aññataram kammārabhaṇḍu puttam ārabbha anuññātam

original: aññataro bhante kammārabhaṇḍuputto mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito
analyzed: aññataraḥ bhante kammārabhaṇḍu puttaḥ mātā pitūhi saddhim bhaṇḍitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajitaḥ

original: hoti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
analyzed: hoti tasmim bhante vatthusmim anuññātam

original: Pucchā – ūnavīsativassassa āvuso puggalassa upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
analyzed: pucchā ūnavīsati vassassa āvuso puggalassa upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paṭikkhittā

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paṭikkhittā, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paṭikkhittā sambahulāḥ bhante bhikkhū ūnavīsati vassam puggalam upasampādesuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paṭikkhittā

original: Na bhikkhave jānaṃ ūnavīsativasso puggalo upasampādetabbo, youpasampādeyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo.
analyzed: na bhikkhave ūnavīsati vassaḥ puggalaḥ upasampādetabbaḥ yaḥ upasampādeyya yathādhammo kāretabbaḥ

original: Pucchā – mātāpitūhi āvuso ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā mātā pitūhi āvuso an anuññātam puttam pabbājentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante paññattaṃ, rājā bhante suddhodano bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: vissajjanā sakkesu bhante paññattam rājā bhante suddhodanaḥ bhagavantam upasaṅkamitvā

original: varaṃ yāci, sādhu bhante ayyāananuññātaṃ mātāpitūhi puttaṃ pabbājeyyunti, tasmiṃ
analyzed: varam yāci sādhu bhante ayyā an anuññātam mātā pitūhi puttam pabbājeyyunti tasmin

original: bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Na bhikkhave ananuññāto mātāpitūhi putto pabbājetabbo, yo pabbājeyya, āpattidukkaṭassa.
analyzed: na bhikkhave an anuññātaḥ mātā pitūhi putto pabbājetabbaḥ yaḥ pabbājeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Pucchā – theyyasaṃvāsakassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
analyzed: pucchā theyyasaṃvāsakassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paṭikkhittā

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ purāṇakulaputtaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā, aññataro
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante aññataram purāṇa kula puttam ārabbha paṭikkhittā aññataraḥ

original: bhante purāṇakulaputto khīṇa kolañño sāmaṃ pattacīvaraṃ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā
analyzed: bhante purāṇa kula puttaḥ khīṇa kolaññaḥ sāmam patta cīvaram paṭiyādetvā kesa massuṃ ohāretvā

original: kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvasi, bhante vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
analyzed: kāsāyāni vatthāni a chādetvā ārāmam gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhim saṃvasi bhante vatthusmim paṭikkhittā

original: Pucchā – tiracchānagatassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
analyzed: pucchā tiracchānagatassa āvuso upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paṭikkhittā

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ nāgaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā, aññataro bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante aññataram nāgam ārabbha paṭikkhittā aññataraḥ bhante

original: nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci, taṃ bhikkhū pabbājesuṃ
analyzed: nāgaḥ māṇavaka vaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjam yāci tam bhikkhū pabbājesuṃ

original: upasampādesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
analyzed: upasampādesum tasmim bhante vatthusmim paṭikkhittā

original: Pucchā – mātughātakassa ca āvuso pitughātakassa ca upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
analyzed: pucchā mātu ghātakassa ca āvuso pitu ghātakassa ca upasampadā bhagavatā kattha paṭikkhittā kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paṭikkhittā

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante aññataraṃ māṇavakaṃ ārabbha paṭikkhittā, aññataro
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam yeva bhante aññataram māṇavakam ārabbha paṭikkhittā aññataraḥ

original: ca bhante māṇavako aññataro ca māṇavako mātaraṃ jīvitā voropesi pitaraṃ jīvitā voropesi,
analyzed: ca bhante māṇavakaḥ aññataraḥ ca māṇavakaḥ mātaram jīvitā voropesi pitaram jīvitā voropesi

original: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paṭikkhittā.
analyzed: tasmim bhante vatthusmim paṭikkhittā

original: Mātughātako bhikkhave anupasampanno naupasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo, pitughātako bhikkhave anupasampanno naupasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo.
analyzed: mātu ghātakaḥ bhikkhave anupasampannaḥ na upasampādetabbaḥ upasampannaḥ na āsetabbaḥ pitu ghātakaḥ bhikkhave anupasampannaḥ na upasampādetabbaḥ upasampannaḥ na āsetabbaḥ

original: Pucchā – apattacīvarakaṃ vā āvuso yācitapattacīvarakaṃ vā upasampādentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā a patta cīvarakam vā āvuso yācita patta cīvarakam vā upasampādentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante

original: bhikkhū apattacīvarakaṃ upasampādesuṃ, yācitakena pattacīvarena upasampādesuṃ, tasmiṃ
analyzed: bhikkhū a patta cīvarakam upasampādesum yācitakena patta cīvarena upasampādesum tasmin

original: bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – upasampadaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ sauddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
analyzed: pucchā upasampadam pucchissam sa nidānam sa uddesam sa mukkaṭṭha padānam āvuso kati āpattiyaḥ

original: Vissajjanā – upasampadaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante dve āpattiyo.
analyzed: vissajjanā upasampadam vissajjissam sa nidānam sa niddesam samukkaṭṭha padānam bhante dve āpattiyaḥ

original: 2. Uposathakkhandhaka
analyzed: uposatha khandhaka

analyzed: vissajjanā yadā bhante bhagavataḥ rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ

original: anujāneyyaṃ, so nesaṃ bhavissati uposathakamma”nti tadā bhante bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: anujāneyyam saḥ nesam bhavissati uposatha kamman ti tadā bhante bhagavatā bhikkhūnam

analyzed: pucchā sīmam āvuso sammanitum bhagavatā kattha anuññātam kismin ca vatthusmin anuññātam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante anuññātaṃ, rājagahe bhante bhagavati viharati bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante anuññātam rājagahe bhante bhagavati viharati bhikkhūnam

analyzed: etat ahosi bhagavatā paññattam ettāvatā sāmaggī yāvatā ekāvāsā iti kittāvatā anukho

original: ekāvāso hotī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
analyzed: eka āvāsaḥ hoti iti tasmim bhante vatthusmim anuññātam

original: Pucchā – kati āvuso uposathā divasavasena ca kārakapuggalavasena ca kātabbākāravasena ca.
analyzed: pucchā kati āvuso uposathāḥ divasa vasena ca kāraka puggala vasena ca kātabba ākāra vasena ca

original: Vissajjanā – divasavasena bhante tayo uposathā, puggalavasena ca bhante tayo uposathā, kātabbākāravasena ca bhante tayo uposathā.
analyzed: vissajjanā divasa vasena bhante tayo uposathā puggala vasena ca bhante tayo uposathā kātabba ākāra vasena ca bhante tayo uposathā

analyzed: vissajjanā cattāri imāni bhante uposatha kammāni adhammena vaggam uposatha kammam

original: adhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, dhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, dhammena samaggaṃ

original: uposathakammaṃ. Tatra bhante yadidaṃ adhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, adhammena samaggaṃ
analyzed: uposatha kammam tatra bhante yat idam adhammena vaggam uposatha kammam adhammena samaggam

original: uposathakammaṃ dhammena vaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, evarūpaṃ bhante uposathakammaṃ ananuññātaṃ,

original: tatra bhante yadidaṃ dhammena samaggaṃ uposathakammaṃ, evarūpaṃ bhante uposathakammaṃ anuññātaṃ.
analyzed: tatra bhante yat idam dhammena samaggam uposatha kammam evarūpam bhante uposatha kammam anuññātam

original: Pucchā – uposathaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
analyzed: puccha uposatham pucchissam sa nidānam sa niddesam sa mukkaṭṭha padānam āvuso kati āpattiyaḥ

original: Vissajjanā – uposathaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
analyzed: vissajjanā uposatham vissajjissam sa nidānam sa niddesam samukkaṭṭha padānam bhante tissaḥ āpattiyaḥ

original: Vissajjanā – divasavasena bhante tisso pavāraṇā, tathā puggalavasena kātabbākāravasenaca.

original: Pucchā – katīnaṃ āvuso saṅghe pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ, katīnaṃ panāvuso aññamaññaṃ pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā katīnam āvuso saṅghe pavāretum bhagavatā anuññātam katīnam pana āvuso aññamaññam pavāretum bhagavatā anuññātam

original: Vissajjanā – pañcannaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ saṅghe pavāretuṃ bhagavatā anuññātaṃ, catunnaṃ vā bhante tiṇṇaṃ vā dvinnaṃ vā aññamaññaṃ pavāretuṃ anuññātaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā pañcannam bhante bhikkhūnam saṅghe pavāretum bhagavatā anuññātam catunnam vā bhante tiṇṇam vā dvinnam vā aññamaññam pavāretum anuññātam

original: Pucchā – ekena panāvuso vassaṃvuṭṭhena bhikkhunā kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā ekena pana āvuso vassaṃvuṭṭhena bhikkhunā katham paṭipajjitabban ti bhagavatā anuññātam

original: Vissajjanā – ekena pana bhante bhikkhunā “ajja me pavāraṇā”ti adhiṭṭhātabbanti bhagavatā anuññātaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā ekena pana bhante bhikkhunā ajja me pavāraṇā ati adhiṭṭhātabbanti bhagavatā anuññātam

original: Pucchā – pavāraṇaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
analyzed: pucchā pavāraṇam pucchissam sa nidānam sa niddesam samukkaṭṭha padānam āvuso kati āpattiyaḥ

original: Vissajjanā – pavāraṇaṃ vissajjissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ bhante tisso āpattiyo.
analyzed: vissajjanā pavāraṇam vissajjissam sa nidānam sa niddesam samukkaṭṭha padānam bhante tissaḥ āpattiyaḥ

analyzed: cammakkhandhaka

analyzed: soṇamathera vatthu

analyzed: pucchā antovuṭṭham vā āvuso antopakkam vā sāmaṃpakkam vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā bhante

original: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Suppiyā vatthu
analyzed: suppiyā vatthu

original: Pucchā – manussamaṃsaṃ āvuso paribhuñjantassa thullaccayañca appaṭivekkhitvā maṃsaṃ paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭañca bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā manussa maṃsam āvuso paribhuñjantassa thullaccayam ca a paṭivekkhitvā maṃsam paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭam ca bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante bhikkhu appaṭivekkhitvā manussamaṃsaṃ bhuñji, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā bārāṇasiyam bhante aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha paññattam aññataraḥ bhante bhikkhu a paṭivekkhitvā manussa maṃsam bhuñji tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Na bhikkhave manussamaṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ, yo paribhuñjeyya, āpatti thullaccayassa, na ca bhikkhave appaṭivekkhitvā maṃsaṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ, yo paribhuñjeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: na bhikkhave manussa maṃsam paribhuñjitabbam yaḥ paribhuñjeyya āpatti thullaccayassa na ca bhikkhave a paṭivekkhitvā maṃsam paribhuñjitabbam yaḥ paribhuñjeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Pucchā – hatthimaṃsaṃ vā āvuso assamaṃsaṃ vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā hatthi maṃsam vā āvuso assa maṃsam vā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū hatthimaṃsampi assamaṃsampi paribhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā bārāṇasiyam bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante bhikkhū hatthi maṃsam pi assa maṃsam pi paribhuñjiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – sunakkhamaṃsaṃ vā āvuso ahimaṃsaṃ vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā su nakkhamaṃsam vā āvuso ahimaṃsam vā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū sunakkhamaṃsampi ahimaṃsampi paribhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.

original: vā kāyuraṃ vā hatthābharaṇaṃ vā aṅgulimuddikaṃ vā dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā
analyzed: vā kāyuram vā hattha ābharaṇam vā aṅguli muddikam vā dhārentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā

original: kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vallikādīni dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū vallikā ādīni dhāresuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – dīghe āvuso kese dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā dīghe āvuso kese dhārentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū dīghe kese dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū dīghe kese dhāresuṃ tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – kocchenavā āvuso phaṇakenavā hatthaphaṇakenavā kese osaṇṭhentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā kocchena vā āvuso phaṇakena vā hattha phaṇakena vā kese osaṇṭhentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kocchādīhi kese osaṇṭhesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante chabbaggiyā iva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū kocchādīhi kese osaṇṭhesum tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – ādāse vā āvuso udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṃ olokentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā ādāse vā āvuso udaka patte vā mukha nimittam olokentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ādāsepi udakapattepi mukhanimittaṃ olokesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante chabbaggiyā iva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū ādāse pi udaka patte pi mukha nimittam olokesum tasmin bhante vatthusmin paññattam

original: Pucchā – ābādhapaccayā panāvuso ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṃ oloketuṃ bhagavatā kattha anuññātaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā ābādha paccayā pana āvuso ādāse vā udaka patte vā mukha nimittam oloketum bhagavatā kattha anuññātam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim anuññātam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anuññātaṃ, bhagavati bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha anuññātam bhagavati bhante

original: rājagahe viharati aññatarassa bhikkhuno mukhe vaṇo ahosi, so bhikkhū etadavoca “kīdiso
analyzed: rājagahe viharati aññatarassa bhikkhuno mukhe vaṇaḥ ahosi saḥ bhikkhū etat avoca kīdiso

original: me āvuso vaṇo”ti, bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu “ediso te āvuso vaṇo”ti, so na saddahati, tasmiṃ
analyzed: me āvuso vaṇoti bhikkhū evam āhaṃsu ediso te āvuso vaṇoti saḥ na saddahati tasmin

original: bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātaṃ.
analyzed: bhante vatthusmim anuññātam

original: Pucchā – mukhālepanādīni āvuso karontassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā mukha ālepana ādīni āvuso karontassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mukhālepanādīni akaṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū mukha ālepana ādīni akaṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – naccaṃ vā āvuso gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā naccam vā āvuso gītam vā vāditam vā dassanāya gacchantassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante naccampi gītampi vāditampi dassanāya gacchiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante naccam pi gītam pi vāditam pi dassanāya gacchiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – kathaṃ āvuso naccādīni passantassa āpatti hoti, kathaṃ pana anāpatti.
analyzed: pucchā katham āvuso nacca ādīni passantassa āpatti hoti katham pana anāpatti

original: Vissajjanā – naccaṃ vā bhante gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa,
analyzed: vissajjanā naccam vā bhante gītam vā vāditam vā dassanāya gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa, dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ
analyzed: yattha ṭhitaḥ passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa dassana upacāram vijahitvā punappunam

original: passati āpatti dukkaṭassa, ārāme ṭhitassa passato anāpatti, vihārato pana vihāraṃ
analyzed: passati āpatti dukkaṭassa ārāme ṭhitassa passataḥ anāpatti vihārataḥ pana vihāraṃ

original: passissāmīti gacchato āpattiyeva, yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa,
analyzed: passissāmi iti gacchataḥ āpattiyā iva yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: āsanasālāya nisinno passati anāpatti, passissāmīti vuṭṭhahitvā gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa,
analyzed: āsana sālāya nisinno passati anāpatti passissāmi iti vuṭṭhahitvā gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: yattha ṭhito passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa, patipathaṃ gacchanto passati
analyzed: yattha ṭhitaḥ passati vā suṇāti vā āpatti dukkaṭassa patipatham gacchantaḥ passati

original: anāpatti, gīvaṃ parivattetvā passato pana āpatti bhante.
analyzed: anāpatti gīvam parivattetvā passato pana āpatti bhante

original: Pucchā – āyatakena āvuso gītassarena dhammaṃ gāyantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā āyatakena āvuso gītassarena dhammam gāyantassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṃ gāyiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū āyatakena gītassarena dhammam gāyiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – dārupattaṃ āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā dāru pattam āvuso dhārentassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājaṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, āyasmā
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante āyasmantam piṇḍolabhāradvājam ārabbha paññattam āyasmā

original: bhante piṇḍolabhāradvājo chavassa dārupattassa kāraṇā gihīnaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ
analyzed: bhante piṇḍolabhāradvājo chavassa dāru pattassa kāraṇā gihīnam uttari manussa dhammaṃ

original: iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dasseti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: iddhi pāṭihāriyam dasseti tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Na ca bhikkhave dārupatto dhāretabbo, yo dhāreyya āpatti dukkaṭassa –
analyzed: na ca bhikkhave dāru pattaḥ dhāretabbaḥ yaḥ dhāreyya āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Pucchā – bhagavatā āvuso uccāvace patte paṭikkhipitvā ayo patto bhūmipattoti imeyeva dve pattā kattha anuññātā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
analyzed: pucchā bhagavatā āvuso uccāvace patte paṭikkhipitvā ayaḥ pattaḥ bhūmipatto ti imeyeva dve pattā kattha anuññātā kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim anuññātā

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū uccāvace patte dhāresuṃ sovaṇṇamayā rūpiyamayā, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuññātā chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū uccāvace patte dhāresum sovaṇṇa mayā rūpiya mayā tasmim bhante vatthusmim anuññātā

original: Pucchā – sodakaṃ āvuso pattaṃ paṭisāmentassa ca otāpentassaca uṇhe pattaṃ nidahantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā sa udakam āvuso pattam paṭisāmentassa ca otāpentassa ca uṇhe pattam nidahantassa ca dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante

original: bhikkhū sodakaṃ pattaṃ paṭisāmesuṃ, otāpesuṃ, uṇhe pattaṃ nidahiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
analyzed: bhikkhū sa udakam pattam paṭisāmesuṃ otāpesum uṇhe pattam nidahiṃsu tasmim bhante

original: vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – chavasīsapattaṃ āvuso dhārentassa ca sabbapaṃsukūlikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā chava sīsa pattam āvuso dhārentassa ca sabba paṃsukūlikassa ca dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha paññattaṃ, aññataro bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha paññattam aññataraḥ bhante

original: bhikkhu sabbapaṃsukūliko ahosi, so chavasīsassa pattaṃ dhāresi, aññatarā itthī passitvā
analyzed: bhikkhu sabba paṃsukūlikaḥ ahosi so chava sīsassa pattam dhāresi aññatarā itthī passitvā

analyzed: bhītā vissaram akāsi abhum me pisācaḥ vatāyanti tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – calakāni vā āvuso aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ vā pattena nīharantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā calakāni vā āvuso aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭha udakam vā pattena nīharantassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, sambahulā bhante
analyzed: vissajjanā rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam sambahulāḥ bhante

original: bhikkhū calakānipi aṭṭhikānipi ucchiṭṭho dakampi pattena nīhariṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante
analyzed: bhikkhū calakāni api aṭṭhikāni api ucchiṭṭhaḥ dakam pi pattena nīhariṃsu tasmim bhante

original: vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – upāhanatthavikā āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
analyzed: pucchā upāhanatthavikā āvuso bhagavatā kattha anuññātā kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim anuññātā

original: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante rājagahaṃ antarā ca vesāliṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
analyzed: vissajjanā antarā ca bhante rājagaham antarā ca vesālim aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha

analyzed: anuññātā aññataraḥ bhante bhikkhu upāhanāyaḥ kāyabandhanena bandhitvā gāmam piṇḍāya

analyzed: pāvisi aññataraḥ upāsako tam bhikkhum abhivādento upāhanāyaḥ sīsena ghaṭṭeti so bhikkhu

original: maṅku ahosi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
analyzed: maṅku ahosi tasmim bhante vatthusmim anuññātā

original: Pucchā – addhānamaggappaṭipannena āvuso parissāvanaṃ yāciyamānena na dadantassa ca
analyzed: pucchā addhāna magga ppaṭipannena āvuso parissāvanam yāciyamānena na dadantassa ca

original: appaṭissāvanakena addhānaṃ paṭipajjantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ,
analyzed: a paṭissāvanakena addhānam paṭipajjantassa ca dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam

original: kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante rājagahaṃ antarā ca vesāliṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
analyzed: vissajjanā antarā ca bhante rājagaham antarā ca vesālim aññataram bhikkhum ārabbha

original: vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – pupphābhikiṇṇe āvuso sayane sayantassa dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: pucchā puppha abhikiṇṇe āvuso sayane sayantassa dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pupphābhikiṇṇesu sayanesu sayiṃsu, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vissajjanā vesāliyam bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyāḥ bhante bhikkhū puppha abhikiṇṇesu sayanesu sayiṃsu tasmim bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – ekabhājane vā āvuso bhuñjantānaṃ ekathālake vā pivantānaṃ ekattharaṇapāvuraṇānaṃ
analyzed: pucchā eka bhājane vā āvuso bhuñjantānam ekathālake vā pivantānam ekattharaṇa pāvuraṇānam

original: vā tuvaṭṭānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: vā tuvaṭṭānam dukkaṭam bhagavatā kattha paññattam kam ārabbha kismim vatthusmim paññattam

original: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṃ, chabbaggiyā
analyzed: vissajjanā vesāliyam bhante chabbaggiyā iva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattam chabbaggiyā

original: bhante bhikkhū ekabhājanepi bhuñjiṃsu, ekathālakepi piviṃsu, ekamañcakepi tuvaṭṭesuṃ,
analyzed: bhante bhikkhū eka bhājane pi bhuñjiṃsu eka thālake pi piviṃsu eka mañcake pi

original: ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭesuṃ, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭesuṃ, ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi, tasmiṃ
analyzed: eka pāvuraṇā api tuvaṭṭesum eka ttharaṇa pāvuraṇā api tasmin

original: bhante vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
analyzed: bhante vatthusmim paññattam

original: Pucchā – cāmaribījaniṃ āvuso paṭikkhipitvā tisso bījaniyo bhagavatā kattha anuññātā, kismiñca vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.
analyzed: pucchā cāmari bījanim āvuso paṭikkhipitvā tissaḥ bījaniyaḥ bhagavatā kattha anuññātā kismin ca vatthusmin anuññātā

original: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante anuññātā, sāvatthiyaṃ bhante bhagavati viharati saṅghassa
analyzed: vissajjanā sāvatthiyam bhante anuññātā sāvatthiyam bhante bhagavati viharati saṅghassa

original: cāmaribījanī uppannā ahosi, bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ anuññātā.

original: Pucchā – kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅgho samaggo hoti.
analyzed: pucchā kittāvatā nu kho āvuso saṅghaḥ samaggaḥ hoti

original: Pucchā – samaggaṃ āvuso saṅghaṃ bhinditvā kiṃ so pasavati.

analyzed: vissajjanā bhinnam kho bhante saṅgham samaggam katvā brahmam puññam pasavati kappam saggamhi modati

original: Pucchā – saṅghabhedaṃ pucchissaṃ, sanidānaṃ saniddesaṃ. Samukkaṭṭhapadānaṃ āvuso kati āpattiyo.
